ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 528
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that durn quest will make you nuts, I am not lying...I had 3! BLs farming them worms at the same time for me and still didn t get many of the bile.  FYI,
ygData.messageBody:
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Sun, 14 Jul 2002 23:53:15 -0400
> From: <ariaya@...>
> Subject: Looking for Xakra Bile & rockhopper blood
>
> Hi all,
>
> I'm trying to do the progressive pottery quest with my vah shir bard,
> but I'm running into supply issues.
>
> I've tried killing all the worms & young rockhoppers I can find in the
> Shar Val Pit, but I can't seem to find the bile & blood! I got just
> enough bile to get my drum & to get the first part of the pottery quest
> done, but I can't seem to get any more!!
>
> So far I know Xakra bile drops off of Xakra Larvae & the rockhopper
> blood drops off of young rockhoppers .. both in the shar val pit.
>
> Any suggestions?
>
> Thanks
> Ariaya, Ranger of 20 seasons
> Cariaya, Bard of the 8th circle
> Sariaya, Enchanter of the 9th circle
> Heart of the Dunedain, Terris-Thule Server
> ariaya@...
>
>
that durn quest will make you nuts, I am not lying...I had 3! BLs
farming them worms at the same time for me and still didn't get many of
the bile. FYI, keep the xakra blood you come across too. Instead of
using the jars to get your skill higher, go to
http://www.eqtraders.com/learn/learn_pottery2.htm and use his advice,
only thing I'd change is the first amount of sketches, will probably
take 3 stacks of them to get to trivial on them. BAM! new master potter
after reading that page for the first time. Next skill points after 122
will be tough. 50pp per stack of sketches for large bowls, ugh.

Bookmark eqtraders and look up the quests section for more info on the
pottery quest.

Good luck

Bebinn
